categories.name: Movies worth CSSing
categories.hint: Movies with CSS-related things in their titles

questions.clue: Keanu Reeves infiltrates a gang of bank robbing surfers in this 1991 cult classic
In the colorful future, a cab driver (Bruce Willis) unwittingly becomes the central figure in the search for a legendary cosmic weapon to keep Evil and Mr. Zorg (Gary Oldman) at bay.
A young Peruvian bear travels to London in search of a home in this 2015 animated comedy
Two powerful mutants (Charles Xavier and Eric Lensherr) join together to stop a ruthless dictator from thrusting Russia and the U.S. into nuclear war.
Steven Spielberg directs Whoopi Goldberg, a black Southern woman struggling to find her identity after suffering abuse from her father and others.

categories.name: Tricky CSS Sites
categories.hint: Websites (that aren't CSS-Tricks) where people learn CSS

questions.clue: Often atop CSS-related search resutls, but that doesn't mean devs love it
Browser support tables for modern web technologies (including CSS)
This site demonstrates what can be accomplished by only changing the CSS
Launched in 2005 when a small team of idealists set out to create a new, free, community-built online resource for all Web developers
This site shows you CSS alternatives for common JS UI components.
Some animations can cause dizziness and nausea in people with vestibular disorders. Media queries to the rescue!
This experimental CSS property allows animations to be driven by a container's scroll position
This modern image format is optimized for web environments. It boasts better image compression than WebP, JPEG, PNG and GIF
The new Cookie Store API has a more modern interface than `document.cookie` and can also be used in these.
This CSS property sets whether an element's background extends underneath its border box, padding box, or content box.
Miss the browser? This function might console you. It works pretty much the same in Node.
Node.js runs on this JavaScript engine, which is also at the core of Google Chrome
You have to use `require` instead of `import` in Node because it relies on this module system
If you want to read an environment variable or exit from a Node program, you must use this core module
`this` in the browser's global scope refers to `window`, but in Node's it refers to...

categories.name: Framewords
categories.hint: CSS frameworks in their own words/marketing copy

questions.clue: Simple and flexible HTML, CSS, and Javascript for popular user interface components and interactions. From Twitter
A utility-first framework to rapidly build modern websites without ever leaving your HTML
A free, open source framework that provides ready-to-use frontend components that you can easily combine to build responsive web interfaces. No CSS knowledge required
This 8bit-like CSS Framework is brimming with 80's nostalgia
The less formal CSS framework. Its goal is to be as minimal as possible when adding classes.

questions.clue: You can use multiple background images and nested <div>s to achieve the rounding effect possible with this one property

This is the best PLACE for your style rule to ensure it gets applied
It used to be a trickier aspect of CSS, but flexbox and grid have made it trivial to pull off
This proprietary Microsoft extension to Internet Explorer provides a mechanism to target each of the versions of IE either specifically, or as a group.
